feed.title: theausinstitute TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from theausinstitute

entry.title: It's a no-brainer for Aus to have a windfall profits tax on the gas industry. "Imagine if we collected $40bn from the gas industry & used it to make the price of things lower. Imagine if we made childcare free." #auspol
entry.content: It's a no-brainer for Aus to have a windfall profits tax on the gas industry. "Imagine if we collected $40bn from the gas industry & used it to make the price of things lower. Imagine if we made childcare free." #auspol

entry.title: If the Australian government started taxing oil and gas companies properly, like in Norway, they could give Australians free university education. It's not that we can't afford it. It's that our governments haven't chosen to do it. #auspol
entry.content: If the Australian government started taxing oil and gas companies properly, like in Norway, they could give Australians free university education. It's not that we can't afford it. It's that our governments haven't chosen to do it. #auspol

entry.title: Prices continue to rise and rents have recorded their strongest quarterly increase in 35 years. Richard Denniss joins Today to discuss what this means for interest rates.#auspol
entry.content: Prices continue to rise and rents have recorded their strongest quarterly increase in 35 years. Richard Denniss joins Today to discuss what this means for interest rates.#auspol

entry.title: With the federal government bringing back their housing affordability bill next week - and rents going through the roof - this feels like a good time to revisit why we're in a housing crisis, and what we can do to fix it. #auspol
entry.content: With the federal government bringing back their housing affordability bill next week - and rents going through the roof - this feels like a good time to revisit why we're in a housing crisis, and what we can do to fix it. #auspol

entry.title: Let us just say it for what it is: CCS is a scam. It is a scam that has been used by the coal and gas industries to con (usually willing) governments and populations into delaying climate action. #auspol #climatechange
entry.content: Let us just say it for what it is: CCS is a scam. It is a scam that has been used by the coal and gas industries to con (usually willing) governments and populations into delaying climate action. #auspol #climatechange
